reviewText:
Keeper of the Kohn captures the true meaning of sports and what it means to be both a player and a coach. Peter's spirit is truly captured in this film as well as that of teams, and the ability for coaches to help mold men and women that play for them.

The best way to describe this movie is to describe the sport of lacrosse; the oldest game played in the world with a small community of people who while we compete against on and other off the field, are friends off the field.
